archimate:Capability.name: C2. Execute campaigns
archimate:Capability.documentation: The ability to raise awareness about screening and therefore increase both the coverage and uptake of screening pathways. This might be through targeted marketing campaigns or broader campaigns promoting the benefits of screening and early detection of disease.

properties.value: Service analysis to understand current uptake and identification of areas to improve
Marketing campaigns focused on improving screening uptake and the ability to measure campaign effectiveness
